original_text: and the doors on the street are shut—when the sound of the grinding is low, and one rises up at the sound of a bird, and all the daughters of song are brought low—
korean_text: 길거리 문들이 닫혀질 것이며 맷돌 소리가 적어질 것이며 새의 소리로 말미암아 일어날 것이며 음악하는 여자들은 다 쇠하여질 것이며

sentences.original_text: and the doors on the street are shut
when the sound of the grinding is low
and one rises up at the sound of a bird
and all the daughters of song are brought low
